# query

**Instance Property**

Contains the media items found by the query used to create the queue descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var query: MPMediaQuery { get }
```

## Media item queue descriptor properties

- **itemCollection**: Contains the media item collection used to create the queue descriptor.
- **startItem**: Designates the media item to play first.

items.description: Contains the media item collection used to create the queue descriptor.
